metadata.title: Automatically Fixing Errors in Glycoprotein Structures with Rosetta Graphical Abstract Highlights d New method for refinement of carbohydrates with low- resolution electron density d Improved physical geometry of glycans in protein structures d Compatible with cryoEM and X-ray crystallography data Automatically Fixing Errors in Glycoprotein Structures with Rosetta

abstract.original_text: Frenz et al. have developed a new method for refinement of glycoprotein structures against low-resolution cryoEM and X-ray crystallography data. This new method is able to make significantly larger changes to the glycan geometry compared with previous methods, including the ability to changing the glycan's anomer.

sentences.segment_text: Frenz et al. have developed a new method for refinement of glycoprotein structures against low-resolution cryoEM and X-ray crystallography data .
This new method is able to make significantly larger changes to the glycan geometry compared with previous methods ,
including the ability to changing the glycan 's anomer .
